price: One koji se budu zbog Nas borili Mi ćemo, sigurno, putevima koji Nama vode uputiti. – A Allah je, zaista, na strani onih koji dobra djela čine!
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā wa-inna al-laha lamaʿa al-muḥ'sinīna
